website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular and unique take on hair rollers provides a non-heat option for those wanting safer curling technology.
pros: Includes 42 curling rods, offering incredible value
Comes with different sizes for various hairstyles
cons: Can be relatively uncomfortable to sleep in, but there are many ways to work around that

customer_reviews.title: Waves or curles
customer_reviews.text: If you start the rod at the top near your head and twist it around the rods instead of roll them up, you get nice waves- this was 2 hours with barely dampened hair.
customer_reviews.author: Zeamayes

customer_reviews.title: Even if you lack hairstyling skills you can use these!
customer_reviews.text: Tried these for the 1st time yesterday. They were super easy to use, not horrible to sleep on and easy to take out. Curls were full and fell nicely. I didn't have to untangle hair or pull to get these rods out. Please know I am a 30 something year old who has no hair skill at all so these are great for women like myself who throws their hair in a ponytail and goes because they lack skill.
customer_reviews.author: alyce heifner

customer_reviews.title: Best curlers I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have hair to my knees. These really worked to curl my hair and last all day. The best part Is no frying my hair with heat. They also did not break or get tangled in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I did these straight out of the shower. In my pictures I used the 2nd, 3rd and 4th largest (skipped the biggest) and 2 of the middle sized ones. These actually weren't too bad to sleep in - I also used a sleep cap/shower cap to keep them in place while sleeping. I watched a few YouTube videos to get an idea of how to use them. Will definitely buy more of to be able to use more of the same size!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Welch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my. Curls !! These actually work and come as in the picture above !! 💯
customer_reviews.author: Dymond McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Curled my 4c Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thick 4c hair and I love this set. I usually have the smaller odds at the ends of my hair and have the bigger rods at the top of my hair. My hair came out so curly. It really reminded me of the movie star curls because it has been such a long time since I have seen my hair curl without having to use heat to it. I will either use a curling cream or a curling gel and leave the rods in overnight and then I get my curls in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Fields-Williams

customer_reviews.title: My curls came out so defined💁🏾This is a great investment for all you naturals out there that want ...
customer_reviews.text: My curls came out so defined💁🏾This is a great investment for all you naturals out there that want a style that lasts for a week❣️
customer_reviews.author: Majiyah Blackwell-Henry

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm transitioning from relaxed to natural and these flex rods make the process easier.
customer_reviews.author: ShevyM

customer_reviews.title: I like them so much
customer_reviews.text: I like them so much! I like the larger curve, so I used the largest ones after my hair is almost dry. I sleep with them for whole night and in the next morning, my hair looks so great!
customer_reviews.author: Yue Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Love them and I want more! I am so lazy and hate curling my hair, but these are so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kcloco_12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Neither mine nor my daughters hair hold any curl and the curl lasted all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use this on compelely wet hair because mine didn't work when I tried so; they tangled and didnt dry all the way. I washed my hair and dried it until it wasn't very wet anymore. I have very long and thick hair and used only a couple rods; there are plenty! I rolled my hair and put a hair net on overnight to keep them in place. Not very comfortable to sleep in, but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Workman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of very fine hair. I have tried the following methods with these rollers: large rollers wet hair, large rollers dry hair, small rollers wet hair, small rollers dry hair, small/large rollers overnight, no hairspray, ALL THE HAIRSPRAY. Nothing. Additionally, the larger rollers are harder to keep in place. There are no pins of any kind and they are less bendy.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Roll in different ways for different curls
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo, I just recieved these today and couldn't wait to try them out. I brushed out my tangles, sectioned my hair, ran dampened fingers through each section and rolled. 1 hr later and my hair was manageable for the first time! My hair ranges from wavy-curly and is very frizzy. There was no damage done to my hair and I was so pleased with the results. All I did was flip my hair over and shake a few times.... I am blown away by just how simple this is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these!!! I was skeptical at first and now they are part of my every night routine. I love having carefree curls that last as long as I do without having to put heat on my already dry from bleaching hair. I would recommend these for any and everyone who is tired of the heat and the smell of a traditional curling iron or wand. I will never go back!
customer_reviews.author: ZombieCakez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who these people are claiming they have beautiful curls after using these, but they must have paper thin hair. I didn't fully wet my hair, I dampened my dried hair and had these "curlers" in for 11 hours and when I took them out, my hair was still wet and looked like a wet poodle. Absolutely horrible. Totally disappointed they can't be returned. They also stink like chemicals. If I could give these 0 stars, I absolutely would.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great curls but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I 💚 these! I always end up having to use too much hair per curler because so many companies don't give you enough curlers. Well I can go crazy with these and have plenty left over. Picture included is using the largest blue and pink curlers. Still great curls! Even curlier with the smaller ones. The other pro is the price-11 bucks? Sweet! Minus one star since my long/thick hair does get stuck in the white ends of these and they are pretty uncomfortable to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: ... wanting flexi rods for a while and I'm so glad to have over 40 of them for under $11
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting flexi rods for a while and I'm so glad to have over 40 of them for under $11. I tested one on my dry old hair and I like them. I love the way it's so easy to bend. I've included a photo that shows how the sizes curl.
customer_reviews.author: AlleniaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smelled of gasoline
customer_reviews.text: These had a very strong gasoline smell when I opened the package (which was ripped open). Not about to put toxic rollers in my hair overnight. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: not yet tried since could not bear the smell: ...
customer_reviews.text: not yet tried since could not bear the smell :( spraying rose water on it for couple of days but it does not go away..
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use hair rollers
customer_reviews.text: These rollers are so easy to use that it only took a few minutes to roll my hair and my hair is very very long. It is a smooth Rod so I don't anticipate any snags or tangling when I remove them. I expect a good outcome but guess I won't know until I take them out. The verdict... I've never gotten such beautiful curls with so little effort and the rollers do not tangle in your hair. I love these rollers . This is my second purchase of these excellent hair rollers. My daughter loved how it made my hair look and so I bought her a package to send to her in Virginia. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Glass

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used no hest hair curlers isn’t the past similar to this one. But this by far is the worst one. The ends of the curler (the white round part) kept coming off and getting caught to my hair. I only used it once with dampen hair for 4 hours. After I took the curlers out, my hair was a frizzy mess. I am definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: but that is my bad. I went all the way up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had never used this type of curler before. Used them a few days ago (actually slept in them) and boy did they curl. A bit to curly for me, but that is my bad. I went all the way up to the head with them, and used smaller rods. Tried them again (larger rollers and not tight to the head) and this time just left them in half an hour and blow dried them a few minutes. LOVED how soft the curls were. These things are so easy to use. So happy I found them. Am enjoying experimenting with them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Auten

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: I like to think I’m a conceptual and intelligent person with patience, but I just can’t seem to get these to work right! I have shoulder length thin, fine hair. I do not like this product and it didn’t work for me so I gave them to my best friend who has just fine hair and past shoulder length, she said they work okay but she isn’t really a fan either.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron For President

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple product - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple product - easy to use. This company appears customer oriented as they followed up with an email checking everything was ok. I haven't fully tested it out yet. My hair takes the curl but it quickly straightens which is the issue I have with my hair. Anyway I like the different sizes and the curl it produced. Will use some hairspray before putting the rollers on next time I try it.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: They Don’t Stay In
customer_reviews.text: My hair is relatively short. I chose sizes that I could wrap my hair about 1 and a half to two times around. Since my hair dries quickly, I put them in immediately after shampooing and applying mousse. Within about 10 minutes, they were falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The one curl came out good but I couldn't smell that all day
customer_reviews.text: These smell awful. I soaked them with water/shampoo and then a second time with dish soap but the smell still would not go away. I only tried one rod on my hair because of the smell but wanted to see if it made my hair smell. Yuck! It made it smell awful! I needed to wash my hair. The one curl came out good but I couldn't smell that all day.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The SMELL...
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised that I didn’t come across a review that mentioned the smell. These smell like latex condoms. It made my hair smell like a pornstar/hooker. I’v tried conditioning them, using rubbing alcohol on them, coconut oils, perfume. Now they’re in a bag with baking soda, lavender oil and vinegar which I will later freeze to see if that gets rid of the smell. The biggest rods are the best for short hair, otherwise the smaller rods make my shoulder length hair look like Shirley temple. Aside from the smell they seem to do what I bought them to do.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not the greatest for already thick curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick curly hair. I bought these in hopes to get more tamed, defined curls. These are OKAY. They did provide a little bit of a curl. They are NOT comfortable to sleep in. They also have little white plastic ends on either side that slide out when the rods are bent too much & your hair will get caught around them & it hurts to take them out because the ends snatch your hair. If you have thinner, or relatively straight, tamed hair, then these should work just great for you.
customer_reviews.author: dem

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. Was really looking forward to trying these. Came in the mail today the bag was damaged, the curlers were wrinkled up like they’d been used and I pick one up to find a red hair stuck around one curler. Nice.... definitely pass on this curler and just go to Sally’s or your local beauty store. 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Hair in unopened storage bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these a couple of days ago and received them today, so I was happy with shipping etc. However, I noticed before unzipping the bag that there's a long hair inside of it. The hair is black and mine is light purple so I know it's definitely not mine, in addition to not having opened it yet. I realize things happen but I'm somewhat concerned given the nature of the product that these may be a return/used and that I wasn't made aware of that fact on ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Will Order Again
customer_reviews.text: I love these curlers. I was using hot curling tools which I feel dry my hair out (especially at my age). I get so many compliments on my hair now! I do have to mostly dry my hair and use mousse or hairspray at the ends for them to go in right, but it saves me so much time putting the curlers in at night then just unrolling them in the morning. Using curling irons, etc., took much time! I now get many compliments on how full, etc., my hair is! I will order more if/when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: GODS MIRACLE
customer_reviews.text: Sam and Michelle! I LOVE THESE CURLING RODS!!!! Not only do I love them, the bag they come in?! How about ADORABLE?!!! I am a hair model, and let me tell you, with having red hair, I wash it once a week and let dry shampoo do it's job in between. Once I shower, wash my hair etc. I blow dry and then curl it which my hair does stay curled ALMOST until the next wash. Placing so much heat on my hair all at once bothered me. I came across your product and I can't even begin to describe how it's been 1.5 weeks and my hair is STILL curled!! I LOVE YOU GUYS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roseali

customer_reviews.title: Curls
customer_reviews.text: I did rate 4 stars BUT I think that a lot of people would rate it 5. I am not very good at hair styling at all. I think just a little talent could help me. Having said that, this is a product that actually works for me, my only “flaw” is that it often takes me a few times to get the curler to “stick.” And the white plastic pieces kind of pop out of the ends. But I have still been able to get a curl and have received lots of compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Mine was USED
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these packages, the first package I received looked great never used. The second package I received was USED!! The rods had indents in them and their was long black hair that was caught in the rods. I was grossed out about this, but I needed the rods so I took them out and washed them with clarifying shampoo and anti bacteria had soap. I am giving this product 3 out of 5 stars because my second rods were used and on the zippers on the package were not sealed to show the product is brand new. Other then that these rods are great the curls come out fantastic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.text: Really great for someone trying to avoid using heat damage. Would I say that they’re easier or faster than just regular curling? Definitely not. But, these definitely have their own pros like saving from damage, and possibly being able to give you a natural looking curl. I do suggest using some sort of scrunching foam and or light hold hairspray especially if you have straight or hard-to-curl hair. And make sure your hair is damp, not soaking wet, if it’s too wet you’ll be waiting days to get your curls in the curlers to dry properly! Overall I really like these and I think everyone should have a set of these laying around!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Fast shipment!!! I use em for my wigs Im going to buy another pack because I love curls!
customer_reviews.author: tiombe caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic odor and very cheap material
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cheap product with a very strong plastic odor. The material is strongly cheap and it falls apart after first usage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t hold in my hair. I tried them night for a week and they regularly would fall out through the evening. I have shoulder length hair so maybe my hair is too short? I’ll be gifting them to my sister with waist length hair to see if she can get any use from them. Either it’s back to the old timey wire curlers for me til I find some others that work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal On Flexi Rods You Can Get!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great flexi rods! They were exactly what I expected and they are extremely durable. They also arrived really fast! They are a bit uncomfortable to sleep in, but hey, that's any roller set 😂 But overall, I give them a 5/5 ALSO, your hair dries really fast with them and leaves your curls poppin!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with hairs inside :/
customer_reviews.text: The product came looking like new. None of the rods were used or bent at all. I thought that it was going to be great until I went to use it and found multiple hairs inside. I had not opened it at all, so there was no way that they could have been my own hairs. I am completely disgusted at this product.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective, Eco-Friendly, Curl Your Hair While You Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: The set has ample rods for even long thick hair like mine. Most sets do not have enough rods. 2, they are easy to use. Simply wrap and bend. 3, they are comfortable for sleeping as in sleeping all night long. 4, the rods provide tight curl, which relaxes over time. You can spray and hold the curl at any stage to your liking, or you can let the curl relax on its own. Either way, even poker-straight hair like mine has curl, which simply amazes me. 5, economical with a nice storage case. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND! I love my set!
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! No heat way to curl your hair! I rolled them up with wet hair before bed, and unrolled gorgeous curls in the morning! Soft and flexible! I love these rollers so much more than the conventional hot iron, that damages your hair, these don’t! And they take only 10 minutes to put in! Less to take out. They’re ready to go anywhere with you! I would recommend to anyone! My hair is stick straight and won’t hold a hot curl for any amount of time, so I wa super impressed when I took out the rollers to have beautiful curls that lasted ALL DAY!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Normand

customer_reviews.title: Tight springy curls
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy this but after seeing a review by Buzzfeed I knew I had to try it. I have long hair around 30+ inches since it is so long and heavy it is hard for me to hold a heat curl plus I try to avoid any heat products to prevent damage. I set my hair at night before bed I dampened the hair before setting it in the curls. Once all set I wrapped it up in a scarf. The end result was beyond my expectations a natural looking curl. The curls held all night and the next morning they were still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versitile sizes, uncomfortable to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: I really love these and the way they make my hair look. It takes some time to figure out how to best use them with your hair. I fold down one edge like a hook and then wrap my hair downwards and hook the end as well to get the curls uniform. It's a little uncomfortable to sleep in, but I rode in a car with them travelling to a wedding 2 hrs away and it came out great that way too. Comes in several different sizes which is nice. My hair is almost to my waist and I was able to use even the smallest ones to wrap my hair. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Leah H

customer_reviews.title: Big joke
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, shoulder length hair. Absolutely DID NOT work. Tried again and again. The ends keep "nipping" on my hair when I try to sleep. The rods feel very hard on my head. Impossible to sleep with them on. I guess it's only for people with very long hair so the rods can curl the hair without being close to the scalp. Bleh.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Received a used and unclean product
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the product yet. It appears to have been used by someone else as there were long black hairs on the rods inside the plastic case. Disgusted by this and have yet to take the time to clean and sterilize the rods before using. I don’t want to hassle with returning the product and will increase the stars if I end up liking to product once I have time to prepare it for use.
customer_reviews.author: bux

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product does stay in place once you figure out how to use it. I purchased this understanding it’s not a universal product given that my hair is fairly long and just above my bum. In order for it to work with my hair length I did have to put my hair in a high poney tail. In this picture I up loaded I used 10 rods all 6 blue one which are the biggest ones and then following 4 pink ones. That’s how I achieved the style in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good, takes practice
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with different sizes. This takes quite a bit of experimentation to find the right size, when exactly to place it with how dry your hair is, and also to make sure it will sit right. My first use I picked rollers that were too small and causes frizzy out of control ringlets but the larger caliber curlers got the desired look. I also had to practice bending them just right to stay in my hair but they are flexible and seem study for multiple use. Happy with my purchase as I’m trying to avoid using heat styling appliances to protect my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Abby J

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I had used something similar to this product before. However, I found that the size was not right or they were falling apart fast. I brought these curling rods because they have every size that you could want. They are very sturdy and don't fall apart like the previous ones that I purchased. The different sizes are very convenient. If you need small curls in the front and large ones in the back these work perfect. If you need to curl your hair these take about 10 to 15 minutes to get a good bounce without putting heat to your hair. I would recommend these curling rods.
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: How in the heck do you get these to stay on???
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, terrible execution. They might be great to sleep on but only because they fall straight out of your hair onto the floor. They are going from the floor to the trash can for me! There is no way they will stay in fine hair. Maybe if your hair has some curl to hold in the curlers?? Baffles me how anyone uses these. I simply could not even get one wrap to stay in - they are so slick and smooth, the hair slides right off. I tried twisting them, struggled for ten minutes before I dumped them in the trash. Waste of space
customer_reviews.author: SusanS

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to hot tools & perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thick, wavy, and hip-length. While these are pretty simple to put in, I had trouble keeping them tight enough to hold so much hair. I used serum to reduce frizz and a tiny bit of gel and the curls lasted much longer than when I use my curling wand. However, the curls themselves weren't nearly as tidy but I'm sure with practice and a good technique, I can get pretty close. These seemed to reduce some of the frizz I normally get around the roots of my hair. I wish we could choose the size of rods we want in the pack. I will probably use these on my daughter's hair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Indra

customer_reviews.title: This takes work to get right
customer_reviews.text: So these are not easy right out of the gate. The first few times I tried it, I ended up looking like Shirley Temple (even with the largest ones). Once you figure out what works for your hair though, it really does create long lasting and pretty waves. For those wondering, the only way I can use these is to put them on my hair when it is *just* about dry, and leave them in for an hour or so until they are fully dry. This is the best way to get a nice soft wave that isn't too tight and that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Leyla

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting curls
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully, I don't find these curlers very comfortable to sleep in. However, for me, putting them in at night and taking them out in the morning produces the most long-lasting effect. I have long hair and use the largest curlers (I bought two sets) and while my hair is curly on day one, it's still nice and wavy on day two. Using a curling iron on my bone-straight hair was ineffective; the curls/waves were pretty straight within an hour or two. So all in all, I'm very happy with this product and wish I had known about it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: bedford

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have asked for!
customer_reviews.text: The best product out there for curling hair. My daughter has shoulder length thin hair and the curls are beautiful! I've also tested it out on my thicker, long haired daughter who already had curls and she got some brand new curly hair from these. Sleep in it, don't, it works both ways. I had never done anything like this before, you don't need talent to do this. The only thing is, it didn't come with directions. YouTube your friend when it comes to learning how to use the curlers. I will do my girls hair within 5 minutes and the curls last all day not a problem. I would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: GirlMomB

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to try these. They had good reviews so I thought they would be great. Very disappointed. They were used. Hair was all throughout the package, wrapped around the curling rods. I would never want to purchase something like that but even more so now with a pandemic going on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So pleasanly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I was not sure what to expect. I tried on mostly wet hair, and also on almost dry. I prefer waiting until my hair is almost dry, as other reviewers have recommended. When I tried it on mostly wet hair, my hair refused to dry. These are really easy and don't take much time at all. I haven't used hot curling products since I bought these so I'm hoping they will help restore healthy hair, lol! If you are even thinking about these, I'd say go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very stinky
customer_reviews.text: If you're putting them in and then blow drying your hair these are about the same to use as old fashioned curlers. However, if you're planning on letting your hair set overnight or over time, be prepared that these rods smell VERY strongly plasticky. I tried to let my hair set overnight and I couldn't do it because the smell was so strong it was keeping me awake. Even after leaving them out of their bag for a week to air out the odor is still very strong. Be warned, but other than that they are nifty and work well!
customer_reviews.author: Erin, Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great rods. Poorly made storage bag.
customer_reviews.text: These rods are great and very easy to use. I love the assortment of sizes and colors. My only issue is the carrying bag/case is poor quality. The zipper zipped right off the bag and tore the plastic the very 1st time I used it. I had to replace the bag day 1. Otherwise, the rods are highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried these type of rods in the past. I hated them so much that I got rid of them. I decided to try again, seeing that others have much more success. These here are AWESOME. I think it’s the size variation that has allowed me to master the technique. Highly recommend! Works best for me by doing a very high pony, using mostly dry hair (wet hair does not work for me at all). Sleeping in them that way is painless!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the curling rods to avid using a curling iron every day. I thought I would be able to wear them at night unfortunately, it did not work that way because they are hard and very uncomfortable to sleep in. I have super straight hair so I figured it would be wavy in the morning but it was super curly in the morning I had to get it wet in order to loosen the curls. They are great if you have time to let them set. It is a great option if you want to avoid using heat on your hair every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! I always wanted to try these and on my first try using these, they came out perfectly. I only used 5 of the medium large ones, or the second to biggest ones. I highly suggest watching a YouTube video first before using these and I like wavy curls and this definitely achieved it. So easy to use, pretty comfortable. How many you use, how you twist, and leave it in your hair will all affect the curl. Totally worth the money, many rods different sizes. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: bernice gomez

customer_reviews.title: It's heat free which is probably the best thing about this product
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair so I prefer the curling iron when I need to get my shorter strands or have a more together look. However, these work really well. They do keep your hair curly if you put them on when your hair is damp. I prefer not to sleep in them, especially with the smaller sizes because my hair becomes way to short when I wake up. I think with some practice, these will be easier to use and style my hair with. It's heat free which is probably the best thing about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Torres

customer_reviews.title: So cheap and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, coarse hair that doesn't typically hold curls from any iron. I figured I'd give these a try, not expecting much for the price. I applied them with wet hair and let them dry for about 3-4 hours and holy cow. They were very tight curls that stayed in for 2-3 days. I am very impressed with this and will be recommending them to everyone! I love them! And they are super easy to apply too. Pretty idiot proof and really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Max E.

customer_reviews.title: Just ‘Do’ it !!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollers!! Being home, growing hair, getting long, wondering when a haircut would be possible. Found these rollers at Amazon and without any hair styling abilities I have big hair! Big hair makes everyone popular, who knew !?! Easy to use, and my hair is so much shinier. Can be used with wet and dry hair. Roll dry hair before showering, leave the rollers in for the rest of your morning ablutions, makeup, whatever your morning routine. Unroll gently and do your ‘do’. The rollers are comfortable even for sleeping! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these curlers!!
customer_reviews.text: These curlers took a few trys to get the hang of, but I LOVE them now!!! I put my hair up in a crazy high pony, half way wet my hair with a spray bottle, then put the curlers in(overnight for best results), take out, separate, spritz with curl finishing spray, then bam, nearly perfect curls!!! Picture is with my natural curl, then with a curling wand, then these curlers! My hair looks good for up to 3 days after using these. Probably going to buy more soon because my hair is very thick and long and I need more of certain sizes. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Abbey F

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair!  Beautiful body and curls!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I purchased these because we are trying to protect our hair from heat damage from curling irons. These work great! I have long hair and my daughter has waist length hair and we were both able to use the rollers. They create a lot of waves and volume. My hair is shorter than waist length and I was able to achieve long-lasting curls. They do not tangle, they are soft so they don't hurt your head, and the pack comes with enough rollers to achieve a great look. We are both very, very satisfied with this product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Markela S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for now but there's a definite design flaw
customer_reviews.text: They work great on my toddler's hair. I was looking for something that didn't include Heat and would be easy enough for her grandma to do as well. They work really well and create the cutest curls. I can't give it 5 Stars though. Once you bend it you can tell that the wire inside is forever bent and that concerns me. I don't know how long it will hold up. I think that if I had to do it over again I would just get a few of the same size or a replacement package of a certain size so that I have more of the medium.
customer_reviews.author: ToddlersMom

customer_reviews.title: They dont keep folded that well, and the plastic end get caught easily
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the variety and travel pack, but they dont keep folded around my hair well, often falling undone at night, and the plastic ends easily get caught and making taking them out difficult - I often loose a couple hairs this way. That said, they make really beautiful curls when they work - i like the largest size the best
customer_reviews.author: wren saylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and since this is my first time at it I'm impressed at how effective these rods are; they really do the job and are not bad to sleep on overnight. I like the carrier they come in, keeps them organized. There's a good variety of sizes and enough to do a really big head of hair. I have nothing to compare them to but I would say it's a reliable purchase if you're waffling between a few. They are well made, and after curling you can get them back to their straight condition, no problem, to put back in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kryger

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair ... almost to my waist long hair. Although it is mostly straight after blowing it dry, it has lots of natural body as well. I heard about these types of rollers from a friend and when I found this set on Amazon, I decided to give them a try. I LOVE THESE! I can spritz my hair before going to bed, roll it up, then the next morning I have full and bouncy hair. Too cool! And they are light enough to take on trips. I have already recommended these to friends. Oh, and excellent service from the FBA seller!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value! I was looking at other sets that were quadruple the price. They were simple to use and my girls all slept with them in their hair. (I couldn't). We just did 6 of the largest one in my oldest daughter's hair and she ended up with soft, subtle curls. My little 6-year-old has hair that really curls well and she looked like Shirley Temple and get hair kept they curls for three days. It was fun to try them out. They were actually set in just a few hours. Just start with dry hair and lightly spray with water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flexible curling rods Ive been using them almost every night. I choose these because you get a lot of them and different sizes which is great for curl definition. The more rods you use the more curls I use 12 typically and I roll my hair at night and when I get up in the morning and take the rods out I have great curls. I would highly recommend buying these and I love it comes in this package so I can put my rods right back in the package and zip it!
customer_reviews.author: Maiah

customer_reviews.title: No go!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all, I put these in towel dried hair and slept in them. When I woke up my hair was still slightly damp so I used a blow dryer to finish the process. I took out the curlers and my hair was frizzy and limp. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Buy them you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They make my daughters hair look so cute. She has long hair and these curl it perfectly and dont damage it from the heat. I can not do them on myself without it looking like a clown or the king of the jungle. Haha my hair is too thick (like ridiculously thick ) or maybe I just cant do it on myself. Who knows. lol but these are definitely worth it. Support this small business over the corporations 😉
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Steffensen

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday and had to try them out today sooo happy I will attach photos to show how easy this is I just put them on with a little curl spray and after 3 hours these are the curls that came out
customer_reviews.author: y_manzo

customer_reviews.title: A huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: A huge disappointment. I have naturally wavy hair and was left with a ball of frizz like never before. Honestly, you would be better off using a curling iron. I wrote another review on this product but that was before the curlers came out.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Experiment and don’t give up
customer_reviews.text: This product has different sizes rods, which makes it great for all hair length, I have long hair and I pick the tiniest ones to curl my hair, it makes it really curly, also I don’t curl them all they way to the roots, (curl them till my chin level) this is just the way I like my hair. Defiantly keep them on for 2-3 hours at least it will last longer, if I do less it only stay for half an hour or so. You would need to exparenemt do get desired result, I’m still experimenting! But if it doesn’t go the way I pictured it to be I just do a pony tail and it always works :)
customer_reviews.author: Lesya

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory but not practically
customer_reviews.text: I like the amount of rods, but it isn't practical nor does it work for my hair. My hair is naturally wavy--so really I just wanted a more defined curl. I also wanted to have this be an overnight curl. But they are not soft enough to be able to sleep on them. It makes the curls look funny--I tried a few times and it looked weird more kinky then curly. Honestly, I haven't used them much nor willl I....waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: THISSY

customer_reviews.title: Not to sleep with
customer_reviews.text: I recomend using these during the day . For sleeping not possible. You cant lay your head on the pillow it bothers you throughout the whole night. I had to get up at midnight and take them off. Wich I had them only for about 3 hours. And let me tell you the. URLs came out amazing. I really loved the look. So I will use them again but maybe early morning for about a couple hours and them take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: 18th century bammin hair do!
customer_reviews.text: I have been alive for 27 years and have always struggled to curl my hair, by myself or professionally. They always fall out no matter the amount of hair spray, so needless to say I was quite sceptical of how well these would work. I loaded them in my hair and was anxious for the next morning.... DO NOT UNDER ESTIMATE THE POWER OF THESE FOAM ROLLERS! If your not cautious you may wake up to the 18th century hair style! I'm giving it great reviews because it did work, I just didnt realize how well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to sleep in. Didn't do anything to my hair. My hair wouldn't dry with these in. Took me several tries to get them to kind of stay put. Definitely wouldn't recommend for anyone with any degree of thickness or length to their hair. Just not a great product to achieve curls in my opinion. Not worth it. :(
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: these are soooo easy to use and i really like that it's not damaging my hair with heat. i waited until my hair was almost dry and used the smallest ones and the review about good ship lollipop (which made me laugh out loud) was happening (i woke up this morning and was laughing as unwinding them) which is basically what i was going for. im going to start trying the other ones and maybe not wind them up so tight in hopes that tames it down a little. i wouldn't brush them out because that only made my hair extremely fluffy.once i figure out which ones work best with my hair i will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Practice, practice, practice.
customer_reviews.text: These take some practice. I had a few trial and error runs with them before I finally got them to work, but they make really great, soft curls. I have really long, thick hair and they definitely have to be left in overnight for the curl to hold. These rollers are a much better alternative to heat curling.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these three times on my daughter. Even after blow drying her hair before and with the rollers in and leaving it slightly damp, her hair was still wet in the morning..so no curl. It’s almost like her hair can’t dry with these in. There is no where for the hair to “breathe” like the old school rollers with the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V

customer_reviews.title: Made very well!
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and well made but just wasn’t for me I have very thick hair about 3” past my shoulders and there wasn’t enough rods for all of my hair and I didn’t find them easy to use but they are nice and I really wanted them to work for me so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time getting my hair to hold a curl. I put these in while my hair was damp (with some volumizing mousse) and waited til my hair was dry-- and my hair was the curliest it's ever been. I still need to play around with the different size rods because I used mainly the smaller ones and I don't think I needed QUITE that tight of a curl-- but overall these definitely work!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sulkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good for your hair & they work!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these rollers. They are comfortable to sleep on. I run my hand under the water and then shake off the excess water and run the hair through my hand and roll it up. I only used about 8 or 9 rollers. After a few hours my hair is ready to take down. I just shake it a little and adjust a little with my hands. Spray with a little homemade hairspray and I'm ready to go. It looks natural with a just the right amount of curl. I only used the largest and next to largest rollers. They were plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi321

customer_reviews.title: Good variety, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was happily suprised how well these work. I just sprayed my hair with water to dampen it then rolled them up slept in them and woke up with great curl. I had to many compliments too. I didn't find them hard to sleep in. I like the bag it comes in to store and carry them. It comes with a few of all sizes. I don't see I will ever use the tiny ones but nice variety when you don't know what size you need. Don't use with your hair super wet because it won't dry. You just want it damp.
customer_reviews.author: nicole cooper

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy more!! Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking ya right these aren't going to really curl my hair, I'll just give to my grand daughter to play with her hair and boy was I wrong!! These are super easy to use, I was able to do my own hair and I have really long hair, I was able to sleep in them without them bothering me too which was a huge plus because it takes forever for my hair to dry. Definitely recommend if you want a product that actually works!! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a no heat option to curl my hair. I have fine hair, that is almost shoulder length. I bought these because so many others have, so glad I did. I am tender headed, meaning I cannot wear curlers for very long; hence the reason I give up and turn to my curling iron. These did not hurt my head, even after wearing them for a long period of time. The curl rods stayed in place, and the curls were bouncy when dried. Very happy with my purchase, and plan to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great on long hair
customer_reviews.text: I just used these for the first time last night. I am almost 70 with waist length gray hair. I want to wear it down at my daughter's wedding and have begun experimenting. First night...just rolled up sections, put on a scarf to wrap curlers and slept really well. My hair was almost dry before I rolled. Loved the way the curls look, better than braid waves. Next will try wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris von Drachenfels

customer_reviews.title: Work really well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter as a safer and healthier (for her hair) alternative to a curling iron. We just dampened her hair, put them in, and she woke up with great curls! They were very easy to put in and take out. She did say they were uncomfortable to sleep in but I think that was to be expected. We haven't tried blow drying instead yet but plan to. Overall great product that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure what I was thinking.
customer_reviews.text: I will not grace you with a photo of the outcome but it was not pretty. I have shoulder length fine hair. I used the small and medium size rollers as that was the best option to keep them in my hair. It was like I did some kind of 80's frizz perm and stuck my finger in an electric socket. I had to wash my hair asap trying to get it back under control. I'm not sure if it was operator error or what but these are a no go for me and will sit in my closet until they end up in a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Emilymu154

customer_reviews.title: These work really well even for thick long hair
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical that these would work on my hair but they have been great! The process of putting them in can be a little time consuming but once you get the hang of it its pretty simple. I have found that because my hair is so long and thick I need to dry my hair with a hair dryer while they are in or the curls will still be wet when I take out the curlers and wont hold up as well. But after drying them the curls held up really well for a whole day without changing much. I'm really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole6010

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how well they work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, fine, straight hair. I can use mousse, curlers or curling iron and hair spray and the curl might last a few hours. Tried these (without mousse) and curls! They were a wave the 2nd day but still there. AMAZING!! More comfortable than regular rollers (for sleeping). I get compliments galore when I use them.....all these years with straight hair....no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 year old daughter for Christmas. She just told me they are one of her favorite things that she received! I’m no expert at doing hair, but these are easy for me to put in and she can sleep in them just fine. In the morning she has beautiful curls for school and she’s so excited! This was a last minute impulse buy, but I’m so glad we got these.
customer_reviews.author: Saffy

customer_reviews.title: Salon results!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! After years of chemical processing and heat appliances I constantly damage my hair. I decided to give my hair a break and just let these rods do the curling, damage-free. I don't know about anyone else, but I put them in when my hair reaches a slightly damp stage ( have used these on dry hair as well). Use a styling product (I like Matrix Air Dry Chill Boho). The key is, don't curls the ends under, let them stick out (cute and quirky), then when you remove the rods, spray your curls lightly with a gentle hairspray. Let sit for 2 minutes, and finger style. Perfect every time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Luther

customer_reviews.title: Great flexirods!
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my natural (relaxer free) type 4b/c hair after washing and conditioning. The gave me the cutest curls. My only problem is that my hair didn't dry in the thicker areas of my hair (may have been user error-too much hair on the rod), so some of those curls didn't take and puffed up in the GA humidity. I still got lots of compliments on the curls though. I just recently bought a hood dryer, so I'm gonna try these rods again as I think the curls will last a long time if my hair gets completely dry before I remove the rods.
customer_reviews.author: SweetT

customer_reviews.title: I love these but USE OIL to
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The bigger ones didn't work well for me but I think I was just using too big of sections. If you're used to sleeping in rollers and such, its pretty comfortable to sleep in. When I took combed my fingers though the curls to make it look more natural, I forgot to use my hair oil (DONT FORGET OIL UNLESS YOU WANT FRIZZY CURLS). Over all the curls are holding and its pretty easy. Didn't even use the whole pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Herring

product_meta.title: Tifara Beauty 42-pack 7" Flexible Curling Rods
product_meta.description: Tifara Beauty Flexible Curling Rods 42-pack comes with 7 different rod sizes. 7/8" 11/16" 5/8" 9/16" 1/2" 7/16" 3/8"
feature_bullets: For all hair types wet or dry

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
